data.name: Lord of the Click 3
data.short_description: Lord of the Click is back triumphantly for the third time, once again exceeding the expectations of all Tower Defense fans. This time, you will definitely need a callus ointment!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3+ or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
